name: Peel Pressure
description:
It’s your first day on your new job. Your task? To deliver the ripest looking bananas to your boss. But how will you cope when the temptations of morality driven peer pressure seep into your world? Find out in Peel Pressure.

The theme of the Wowie 3.0 Jam is Failure is progress. Peel Pressure implements this through having to murder lives to save lives.
